content: this pattern is free on my blog introducing the alternating single_crochet wash cloth pattern how many of you love to crochet dish cloths they are such a quick and easy project and they make such wonderful gifts at any time of the year the alternating single_crochet wash cloth is a perfect beginner pattern for a dish cloth it is easy to remember and made with one of the first stitches you will learn when you start to crochet the single_crochet stitch in this pattern you will simply be alternating the single_crochet stitch with a single_crochet into the back loop only stitch
